A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Are there plot holes? Yes. Are there changes to what I knew Star Wars to be? Big time. But I grew up with the original series\, and lots of viewers found fault in that series as well. This is a new generation’s Star Wars\, and the excited reactions of the young viewers in the theatre clearly show that in 35 or 40 year’s these viewers will remember fondly this new film. Fan boys need remember that times change\, and we had our time. Disney knows how to please young fans\, just like Lucas did when I was a boy with A New Hope.
